Header: President unveils statues of the Buddha and King Mahasen
Content: A Buddha statue and a statue of King Mahasen built at Polonnaruwa, Minneriya area was unveiled under the patronage of President Maithripala Sirisena. The President went to the Minneriya Dewalaya and took part in the religious rituals. Thereafter he unveiled the Buddha statue and the statue of King Mahasen built on the banks of the Minneriya Tank. King Mahasen is considered to have built the Minneriya Tank. A group of people including Mrs. Jayanthi Sirisena were present on the occasion.
